console.log(receipt); // Output transaction receipt
const receipt = await provider.getTransactionReceipt(txHash);
const txHash = "0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc";
// Get transaction receipt
const provider = new ethers.providers.JsonRpcProvider("https://alfajores-forno.celo-testnet.org");
// Connect to Alfajores Testnet
const { ethers } = require("ethers");
await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc')0xe6317492c8a532992019394fe3c827c564169f

await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt(0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc)
await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc')
gasUsed = receipt.gasUsed
receipt = await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc')
await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc')
console.log(`Gas cost: ${gasCost.toString()} wei`)await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc')
const gasCost = gasUsed.mul(gasPrice)
const gasPrice = await ethers.provider.getGasPrice()
const gasUsed = receipt.gasUsed
console.log(`Gas cost: ${gasCost.toString()} wei`)const receipt = await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0x75f8a6f7e78b1d35c975bedeb014b8529d443d777a8a08ae346f3288298870dc')
console.log(`Gas cost: ${gasCost.toString()} wei`)
const gasCost = gasUsed.mul(gasPrice)
const gasPrice = await ethers.provider.getGasPrice()
const gasUsed = receipt.gasUsed
const receipt = await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt('0xe6317492C8a532992019394FE3C827C564169Fe5')
await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt(<transactionHash>)
